description: Professional product photography prompts for e-commerce, catalog, and marketing materials featuring commercial products

prompts.title: Luxury Watch Studio Photography
prompts.prompt: Professional studio product photography of an elegant Swiss luxury watch with stainless steel case and black leather strap, positioned at 45-degree angle on pristine white seamless backdrop, dramatic studio lighting with key light and fill light setup, subtle reflections on watch face and case, crisp focus with shallow depth of field, commercial photography style, high-end product catalog quality, macro lens detail, reflector highlights on metal surfaces, shadows perfectly controlled
prompts.style_guidance: High-end commercial photography with perfect lighting and reflections
prompts.technical_specs: Macro lens, studio lighting setup, white seamless backdrop

prompts.title: Lifestyle Skincare Product Photography
prompts.prompt: Clean, minimalist product photography of premium skincare serum bottle surrounded by natural spa elements, soft morning light filtering through sheer curtains, marble surface with subtle texture, fresh eucalyptus leaves and smooth river stones as props, lifestyle product photography aesthetic, pastel color palette with soft greens and whites, aspirational beauty brand styling, soft shadows and natural reflections, Instagram-worthy composition
prompts.style_guidance: Clean lifestyle aesthetic with natural lighting and spa-like elements
prompts.technical_specs: Natural lighting, lifestyle props, marble surfaces, soft focus

lighting_techniques: Use multiple light sources: key light, fill light, and background light
Employ softboxes or diffusers to create even, professional lighting
Control reflections with reflectors, flags, and careful light positioning
composition_rules: Follow the rule of thirds for dynamic product placement
Create depth with foreground, middle ground, and background elements
Leave negative space for text overlay in commercial applications
product_styling: Ensure products are clean, dust-free, and properly positioned
Use props that complement but don't compete with the main product
Consider the target audience and brand aesthetic when styling
technical_execution: Shoot in RAW format for maximum post-processing flexibility
Use appropriate aperture for desired depth of field (typically f/8-f/11 for sharp products)
Employ focus stacking for macro product shots requiring front-to-back sharpness
background_choices: White seamless paper for clean, professional catalog shots
Textured surfaces (marble, wood, fabric) for lifestyle photography
Gradient backgrounds for modern, dynamic product presentations
